synopsis.text: The anime centers around Fumizuki Academy's lively Class 2-F as they prepare for the upcoming school festival. Their goal is to raise money by operating a Chinese cafe in order to buy new classroom desks and prevent their classmate Mizuki from transferring schools. However, rivals from another class scheme to undermine Class 2-F's cafe. On the first day of the festival, Class 2-F encounters setbacks including Mizuki's inedible cooking and false rumors about their cafe's cleanliness. On the second day, Yoshii cross-dresses as a maid to attract customers. Class 2-F also competes in a high-stakes Summoner Tournament, striving to earn enough funds to meet their goals. Through perseverance and teamwork, the quirky students of Class 2-F band together in hopes of saving their class.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
